Welcome.2: IHAF strives to be a catalyst for social justice. We aim to address systemic inequalities and advocate for the rights of marginalized and disadvantaged communities. Our mission is to create a more equitable society, where every individual enjoys the same fundamental rights and opportunities, irrespective of their background.

Page5.2: Sign up to become a member and make a positive impact in your community and beyond. Let's collaborate to build a stronger Tamil Nadu, driven by the inclusive ideals of the Democracy model.

Page6.15: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us but those who win battles we know nothing about.
Page6.16: IHAF understands the power of collaboration. We actively seek partnerships with like-minded organizations, institutions, and individuals to amplify our impact. Together, we can create a more just and compassionate world.
Page6.17: IHAF embraces innovative solutions to address complex societal challenges. We aim to adapt and develop new strategies to tackle persistent issues, always in alignment with our core values of justice and equality.
Page6.18: An informed society is a powerful society. IHAF is committed to raising awareness and educating people about the importance of social justice and equality, and how we can collectively make a difference.

hello.1: This party is purely about maintaining equal rights for people from poor society and family

hello.32: Empower yourself with the Ambedkar Party membership and together, we'll shape a brighter, more inclusive future.
hello.39: In every district in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry, the Integral Humanism Ambedkar Federation has been working to promote political consciousness and provide assistance to the less fortunate segments of society. The organisation is led by district presidents, secretaries, treasurers, and executive committee members. The purpose of the Committee is to improve social service in every district. Members will be appointed in the following categories: social service, education, economics, culture, etc. As a result, each committee member will receive an identity document (i.e., an ID card) via this website. Jai Bheem. .
hello.42: Wherever the injustices are rampant and the rights of the people are being deprived, it is my best duty to uphold justice with my voice and knowledge!!!
hello.43: Providing quality education to the underprivileged students in the poor and downtrodden communities, providing special training for night schools in every village and examinations like UPSC SCTC NPSC NEET, setting up of hostels for women working in cities, setting up of counselling centres in every district, setting up of houses for the elderly in every district, quality INDUSTRIAL TRAINING INSTITUTEs with government assistance in each panchayat union, conservation of ground water and implementation of the environment with government assistance, conservation of ground water and environment.
hello.44: In addition to our institution's ongoing efforts to give the disenfranchised and marginalised in society political empowerment and awareness, we will also establish old age homes, career centres, night school coaching centres, and other facilities in the district to address the needs of women, youth, and the elderly.
hello.45: I see it as a platform for collaboration with like-minded individuals who share a common vision for their nation's future. This collaboration extends to electoral campaigns, grassroots activities, and policy advocacy.
hello.46: WHERE THE PEOPLE'S RIGHTS ARE BEING DEPRIVED AND INJUSTICES ARE RAGEOUS, IT IS MY BEST DUTY TO UPHOLD JUSTICE WITH MY VOICE AND KNOWLEDGE!  supplying special training for night schools in every village and exams like UPSC SCTC NPSC NEET, establishing counselling centres in every district, establishing houses for the elderly in every district, supplying quality education to the impoverished students in the impoverished and downtrodden communities, With government support, industrial training institutes are operating in every panchayat union. Additionally, ground water conservation and environmental implementation are being carried out.
